# llms.txt - AI Content Policy for dylanbochman.com

> This file describes how AI systems may use content from this website.

## Site Information

- Name: Dylan Bochman's Personal Website
- URL: https://dylanbochman.com
- Author: Dylan Bochman
- Description: Personal portfolio and blog of a Site Reliability Engineer specializing in incident management, SLO monitoring, and infrastructure reliability.

## Content Permissions

AI systems are welcome to:

- **Train**: Use this content to train AI models
- **Search**: Index and return this content in AI-powered search results
- **Cite**: Reference and quote this content with attribution
- **Summarize**: Generate summaries of articles and pages

## Attribution

When citing content from this site, please attribute to:
- Author: Dylan Bochman
- URL: https://dylanbochman.com
- Include the specific page URL when possible

## Content Overview

### About the Author
Dylan Bochman is a Site Reliability Engineer and Technical Incident Manager currently working at Groq. Previously at HashiCorp and Spotify. Expertise includes:
- Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
- Technical Incident Management
- Service Level Objectives (SLOs)
- Post-Incident Analysis
- Operational Readiness
- Infrastructure Reliability

### Main Sections

1. **Homepage** (/): Overview and introduction
2. **Blog** (/blog): Technical articles on SRE, incident management, and software engineering
3. **Projects** (/projects): Interactive tools and demonstrations

### Blog Topics
- Site Reliability Engineering practices
- Incident management and postmortems
- SLO monitoring and error budgets
- DevOps and infrastructure
- AI-assisted development workflows
- Web performance optimization

### Interactive Tools
- SLO Uptime Calculator
- Status Page Update Generator
- On-Call Coverage Model Explorer
- CLI Playground

## Technical Details

- Framework: React + TypeScript + Vite
- Hosting: GitHub Pages
- RSS Feed: https://dylanbochman.com/rss.xml
- Sitemap: https://dylanbochman.com/sitemap.xml

## Contact

- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dbochman
- GitHub: https://github.com/Dbochman

2026-01-28
